name: OwnTrio -Adventure
description:
To meet my lost self

This game is a 2D platformer.

But what makes it special is that you can't jump, and...

you can turn the map around.

Below is a description of what the player can do.

1.movement, interactions



The left screen uses A, S, and D.
The right screen uses the left, down, and right keys.

The interaction is not only with the hold shown in the screenshot above, but other objects exist as well.

2. zoom out, rotate map





The bottom center screen uses W, Up, LeftShift, and Space.

You can rotate under zoom as shown in the screenshot above,

For rotation, you can change the rotation speed by opening the settings.
And this is an important fact.

The last game I looked at
50+ maps.
